misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a competitor known for his strategic play and thoughtful demeanor, hails from the prestigious Kullo Golf Club. Ossi's presence in the forthcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his third appearance in this esteemed tournament. While he is yet to clinch a victory at the Hector Trophée, his commitment to the sport remains unwavering.

Ossi is a player who elicits strong opinions. His game is characterized by a meticulous approach, favoring precision and tactical acumen over raw power. Notably, Ossi's reluctance to use his driver has been a recurring topic of discussion among golf enthusiasts, raising questions about his masculinity.

Despite the external noise, Ossi remains focused on refining his skills and contributing positively to the spirit of the game. His dedication and sportsmanship are commendable, embodying the values cherished within the golfing community.
